mapper.select: SELECT * FROM question WHERE queId = #{queId} and title != '题目';
select * from question order by id desc LIMIT 1;

select q.queId, q.value, q.lv, s.subject_name, k.knowledge_name, qt.qt_name, u.username from question q inner join subject s inner join knowledge k inner join que_type qt inner join user u where title = '题目' and s.Id = q.subject_id and k.Id = q.knowledge_id and qt.Id = q.type_id and u.id = q.user_id;

select q.queId, q.value, q.lv, s.subject_name, k.knowledge_name, qt.qt_name, u.username from question q inner join subject s inner join knowledge k inner join que_type qt inner join user u where title = '题目' and queId = #{queId} and s.Id = q.subject_id and k.Id = q.knowledge_id and qt.Id = q.type_id and u.id = q.user_id;
SELECT distinct queId FROM question where subject_id = #{subjectId} and type_id in (${typeId}) and knowledge_id in (${knowledgeId}) and lv in (${lv})

select q.queId, q.value, q.lv, s.subject_name, k.knowledge_name, qt.qt_name, u.username from question q inner join subject s inner join knowledge k inner join que_type qt inner join user u where title = '题目' and value LIKE '%${name}%' and s.Id = q.subject_id and k.Id = q.knowledge_id and qt.Id = q.type_id and u.id = q.user_id;
